name: Confused Construction
description:
DESCRIPTION:
Confused Construction is a building kit simulator made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 where you need to recreate wacky items as close as possible under a time limit. At the end you will be granted your building score and if you SOMEHOW get a perfect score you can give yourself a pat on the back and remember this great achievement. Now go and put on some tunes on the radio and don't mess up!

CONTROLS:
Move with WASD.
Jump with Space.
Left mouse to pick up and drop objects.
Right mouse to join an object together.
E to lock object in place.
R + mouse movement to rotate object.
